definition: extra/surplus/remaining/remainder after division/(following numerical value) or more/in excess of (some number)/residue (math.)/after/I/me
"to eat" or "food" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 184)
in one's spare time/outside working hours/amateur (historian etc)
to spare no pains or effort (idiom); to do one's utmost
to have lingering fears/trepidation remaining after a trauma (idiom)
handling a butcher's cleaver with ease (idiom); to do sth skillfully and easily
residual heat/surplus heat/fig. old people's capacity for work

sentences.english: I have a weakness for flowers and often boiled tea under them.
sentences.chinese: 餘負花癖，與秋芙常煮茗其下。

sentences.english: Japanese community in shock, has begun relief efforts.
sentences.chinese: 日本社會各界在震驚之餘，已開始全力抗震救災。

sentences.english: Every rider welcomed Velo President Stella Yu.
sentences.chinese: 大家一起歡迎維樂董事長餘彩雲。

sentences.english: Interest arising on the overall cash balance attributable to individual donors will be recorded in the account.
sentences.chinese: 將在帳目中記錄各捐助方現金總結餘產生的利息。

sentences.english: More than 2 cases of maternal uterine scar due to reasons outside the cesarean section.
sentences.chinese: 餘2例產婦因瘢痕子宮外的原因而進行剖宮產術。

sentences.english: I traveled NYC a couple of times with my friends while I was off.
sentences.chinese: 在閒暇之餘，我和朋友們一起去紐約遊玩過幾次。

sentences.english: How important is it for employees to have time outside work?
sentences.chinese: 員工在工作之餘擁有閒暇時間有何重要性？

sentences.english: He diligently worked hard to perform his duties and at the same time he dedicated himself to self-educate himself.
sentences.chinese: 年輕的火炎在努力工作之餘，也不忘了勤力自修。

sentences.english: Jubilantly, he decided to hire a maid to relieve his wife from her domestic tasks.
sentences.chinese: 高興之餘，他僱了一個女傭來減輕妻子做家務的負擔。

sentences.english: What do you usually do on weekends if you have free time?
sentences.chinese: 週末閒暇之餘，你通常做些什麼呢？

sentences.english: She hurried home and turned everything topsy-turvy to find the lives to save.
sentences.chinese: 餘老夫人急忙趕回家，翻箱倒櫃地找待救之物。

sentences.english: You're in luck, Mr. Yu. I have it right here.
sentences.chinese: 餘先生，您運氣真好，正好在我這裏。

sentences.english: There exists an irregular semigroups in which joins of good congruences are good.
sentences.chinese: 存在所有好餘的並都是好餘的非正則半羣。

sentences.english: He then becomes his assistant in exorcising ghosts and demons when he grows up.
sentences.chinese: 撫育之餘，更傳之驅邪殺鬼之術。

sentences.english: Old Mrs. Yu woke up. She was confused by this weird dream.
sentences.chinese: 餘老夫人醒過來，難解這個希罕的夢。

sentences.english: Yosasa river flows through the north of Tochigi Prefecture in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 餘箬川流經日本櫔木縣北部。

definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])
two/both/some/a few/tael, unit of weight equal to 50 grams (modern) or 1⁄16 of a catty 斤[jin1] (old)
to lose/to leave behind/to omit/to bequeath/sth lost/involuntary discharge (of urine etc)
and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
(conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
